column1: Daddy Twofoot was a Hobbits of the Shire in the late Third Age.
Daddy Twofoot lived in a hole on Bagshot Row in Hobbiton
column2: right next door to Gaffer Gamgee and his family. He was a regular at the Ivy Bush
column3: where he was one particular evening in
column4: when Hamfast Gamgee entertained his fellow patrons with his knowledge of Bag End and "Bilbo Baggins". During the conversation
column5: Daddy showed some disdain for Bucklanders

column1: File:The Lord of the Rings Trading Card Game - Daddy Twofoot
1981: The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series):
:Daddy Twofoot is voiced by Leonard Fenton. He is present in the Ivy Bush before Bilbos Farewell Party.Michael Bakewell
column3: The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)

column1: 2001: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring:
:Daddy Twofoots place at the conversation (which is moved to the Green Dragon) is taken over by Samwise Gamgee.Peter Jackson
